title: JULIE'S ABDUCTION NIGHTMARE
description: Newly extended by over 10,000 words, this best-selling book is now even better than before. If you bought the original the extended version is already in your member library!This is Julie's story about her and her family's abduction, sexual torment and enslavement at the hands of a very powerful man.It's an intense account of how unimaginable sexual pleasure can be used to torture, torment and punish a woman. It was through these extreme methods that her family's lives changed in an instant. They quickly learned what punishment, obedience, endurance, humiliation and enslavement really meant!
author: W.L. Dowd
